name: Animals Coloring Book-Free Fun Color Therapy Pages
name_original: Animals Coloring Book-Free Fun Color Therapy Pages
description:
A fun Animal Coloring for your children to express their creativity. Kids can color in one of the many Animal coloring pages. Animal sounds play on each selection of the color. Use the Menu to choose a new design and your children will have hours of fun.

- Choose from a variety of Animal-themed pictures to color
- Change color and size of brush.
- Listen to songs and sounds as you color away
- High Definition Coloring Pages

Simple yet entertaining for your children who loves wildlife! Watch them express their creativity while they color in a cheetah, or decorate a puppy!
